Text:
It is only now that I realise the answer section is 60 pages long and should have been bookmarked, at least by chapter. A few minutes of my time would have saved users hours of scrolling. My mistake.

The good thing about this omission is that the thrill of digging correct answers in the back of the book and comparing it with your own is not gone, even amplified...
